name: GitHub Webhook
description: Receives GitHub webhook events and dispatches them as system events to the agent session.

secret.description: HMAC SHA-256 webhook secret for signature verification

repos.description: Filter: only process events from these repos (owner/name). Empty = all.

mentionFilter.description: Only dispatch comments that mention this username (e.g. a0a1-aone). Empty = all comments.

hooksPort.description: Port of the OpenClaw hooks server (reads from server.port in main config if omitted, default: 3001)
